name: Color Bullets
description:
This game is my submission for the Score Space Game Jam #12. The theme is "Combining". 

How to play:

Move with w-a-s-d. Shoot with left-click. Escape to pause/resume.

You are the white triangle, and enemy triangles are colored. They are trying to catch you. If they do , you lose. In order to kill them you have to shoot bullets that are the same color as the enemy's color. In order to change your bullet's color, you have to step into the colored rectangles. Enemies can also change color if they collide with the color rectangles on the ground.

Music: Cruising The Night Sky - TeknoAXE :

This game was made in the time-span of 72 hours. If you have any feedback, please let me know.

Made by: Kitsomo
